title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 21 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 21 2022
description:
Clay’s theory on why the New York Times admitted the truth on Hunter Biden's laptop. Buck agrees with many of Clay's arguments, but says, "I think your analysis is moving in the right direction. It's just a conclusion that I would be differing with" about charges possibly being brought against Hunter Biden. In fact, C&B wagered "a fine steak dinner" over that point. Joe Biden lied about Hunter, media, Deep State allowed it. ESPN takes stand against Florida Parental Rights bill. Left says Republicans are trying to get Ketanji Brown Jackson's confirmation killed by questioning her record.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
